summary: An email from Allison Huxtable to 'Claimant Services' threatening severe consequences if she is not compensated, referencing a prior agreement made 'for one dollar at the Omega' and alleging harm over the past year. The tone is threatening and indicates a final ultimatum.

persons.name: Allison Huxtable
persons.context: Author of a threatening email to 'Claimant Services' demanding compensation and referencing a prior agreement made 'for one dollar at the Omega'.

events.title: Final Ultimatum Email
events.description: Allison Huxtable sends a threatening email to 'Claimant Services' giving them until 5 PM that day to make her a compensation offer she will accept, or she will 'come for your throat'.

keyFacts: Allison Huxtable sent a threatening email to an entity called 'Claimant Services' on July 23, 2021.
She references a prior agreement where she 'retained you for one dollar at the Omega'.
She alleges she has been harmed by the recipient for the past year.
She issues a final ultimatum, giving them until 5 PM that day to make a compensation offer, or she will 'come for your throat'.
The email is part of the Epstein Victim Compensation Program (VCP) document set, as indicated by the sender domain 'epsteinvcp.com'.
